m7z5fyZazfYFGYdq"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Permit.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6008dabfe393240d73d7dd7688033f72740d570aa422254d29a7dce8568f3aff","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f5196ec75139918c6c7bb4251b36395e668f1fa6d206beba7e7520e74913940d","dweb:/ipfs/QmSyqjksXxmm2mCG6qRd1yuwLykypkSVBbnBnGqJRcuJMi"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x37bb49513c49c87c4642a891b13b63571bc87013dde806617aa1efb54605f386","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b3036b3a83b7c48f96641f2a9002b9f2dcb6a5958dd670894ada21ae8229b3d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmUNfSBdoVtjhETaUJCYcaC7pTMgbhht926tJ2uXJbiVd3"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0xaf28a975a78550e45f65e559a3ad6a5ad43b9b8a37366999abd1b7084eb70721","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b7bd24e224f67f65bfadf85dc2929fa965456bb2415478bd0125471b5ce35245","dweb:/ipfs/QmRaydGr8BTHs1kvaZfsNU69pKzUAGFrvABn1KiRSbE51y"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf980daa263b661ab8ddee7d4fd833c7da7e7995e2c359ff1f17e67e4112f2236","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7448ab095d6940130bcf76ba47a2eab14148c83119523b93dd89f6d84edd6c02","dweb:/ipfs/QmawrZ4voKQjH3oomXT3Kuheb3Mnmo2VvVpxg8Ne5UJUrd"]}},"version":1}

addCollateral(uint256,address).details: requires that the token deposited by the depositor has been enabled by `line.Arbiter`- callable by anyone

params.amount: - the amount of collateral to add
params.token: - the token address of the deposited token

params._borrower: - borrower on the _line contract. Cannot pull from _line because _line might not be a Line at construction.
params._line: - Initial owner of Escrow contract. May be non-Line contract at construction before transferring to a Line. - also is the oracle providing current total outstanding debt value.
params._minimumCollateralRatio: - In bps, 3 decimals. Cratio threshold where liquidations begin. see Escrow.isLiquidatable()
params._oracle: - address to call for collateral token prices

enableCollateral(address).details: - whitelisting protects against malicious 4626 tokens and DoS attacks       - only need to allow once. Can not disable collateral once enabled.

params.token: - the token to all borrow to deposit as collateral

returns._0: - the calculated collateral value to 8 decimals
isLiquidatable - returns true if Escrow.getCollateralRatio is lower than minimumCollateralRatio else false

liquidate(uint256,address,address).details: requires that the cratio is at or below the liquidation thresholdcallable by `line`

params.amount: - the amount of tokens to liquidate
params.to: - the address to receive the funds
params.token: - the address of the token to draw funds from

params.amount: - the amount of collateral to release

updateLine(address).details: - Used if we setup Escrow before Line exists. Line has no way to interface with this function so once transfered `line` is set forever

returns._0: didUpdate - if function successfully executed or not

constructor.notice: - Initiates immutable terms for a Line of Credit agreement related to collateral requirements

enableCollateral(address).notice: - allows  the lines arbiter to  enable thdeposits of an asset        - gives  better risk segmentation forlenders

getCollateralValue().notice: calculates the collateral value in USD to 8 decimals

isLiquidatable().notice: - Checks Line's outstanding debt value and current Escrow collateral value to compute collateral ratio and checks that against minimum.

line().notice: the current controller of the Escrow contract.

liquidate(uint256,address,address).notice: liquidates borrowers collateral by token and amount         line can liquidate at anytime based off other covenants besides cratio

minimumCollateralRatio().notice: the minimum value of the collateral in relation to the outstanding debt e.g. 10% of outstanding debt

oracle().notice: Stakeholders and contracts used in Escrow

releaseCollateral(uint256,address,addres.notice: remove collateral from your position. Must remain above min collateral ratio

updateLine(address).notice: - Allows current owner to transfer ownership to another address

documentation.text: @notice the minimum value of the collateral in relation to the outstanding debt e.g. 10% of outstanding debt
@notice Stakeholders and contracts used in Escrow
@notice all data around terms for collateral and current deposits
@notice the current controller of the Escrow contract.

@notice - Checks Line's outstanding debt value and current Escrow collateral value to compute collateral ratio and checks that against minimum.
 @return isLiquidatable - returns true if Escrow.getCollateralRatio is lower than minimumCollateralRatio else false

@title  - Credit Cooperative Escrow
 @notice - Ownable contract that allows someone to deposit ERC20 and ERC4626 tokens as collateral to back a Line of Credit
